author: Rei Takver
description:
Reform UK’s new constitution grants “extraordinary” levels of power to its chair Zia Yusuf, DeSmog can reveal. The party rulebook grants the multi-millionaire tech entrepreneur extensive, largely unchecked authority to revoke memberships, set the party’s agenda, take emergency disciplinary measures, and suspend potential candidates – without any formal way to sack him. DeSmog asked academics and expert campaigners […]

The post Reform Chair Zia Yusuf Accused of ‘Power Grab’ Through New Constitution appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Reform Chair Zia Yusuf Accused of ‘Power Grab’ Through New Constitution
